item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How to Pronounce Chinese Names a Little Better (36 points | 7 comments)
2. Fedora Moves Towards Forgejo (22 points | 1 comment)
3. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (36 points | 6 comments)

5. Historically, 4NF explanations are needlessly confusing (5 points | no comments)

7. What are you doing this weekend? (3 points | 3 comments)
8. Maliciously crafted GitHub branch name embeds crypto miner into a released package (4 points | no comments)
9. Advent Of Code 2024 in Nix - Day 01-03 (23 points | 3 comments)
10. Flightle – Web-based 2D sidescrolling flight simulator (18 points | 2 comments)
11. Kubernetes on Hetzner (5 points | no comments)
12. [Proposal] introduce a new event in a Lua hook mechanism (3 points | no comments)
13. Launching the 2024 State of Rust Survey (4 points | no comments)
14. Alpine Linux 3.21 (27 points | 3 comments)

16. Breakage! in the Cargo.toml — How Rust Package Features Work (And Break) (16 points | no comments)
17. Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination (57 points | 27 comments)

20. Reversing Anti-Cheat's Detection-Generation Cycle With Configurable Hallucinations (16 points | no comments)
21. NASA Graphics Design Manual (1976) (18 points | 6 comments)
22. Praise to scdoc to generate man pages (30 points | 15 comments)
23. NAVAL GUN Fire Control System software is written in C++, says job listing (6 points | 11 comments)
24. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (11 points | 4 comments)
25. funding.json - an open manifest for describing financial requirements for FOSS projects (1 points | no comments)
